parts.part: Duchess of Argyle Bath King London

relation.text: came to her for a month
enquired kindly after You a few evenings ago
is often atended with bad consequences -- Lady Wallingford is wonderfully well , her Doctor is now
gone to Brighton , Mr. Yates is next week
a week after which I hope
will come to town where they have not been yet for more then a day
addio mia Cara Amicia Miſs Smith & P. of Wales Duchess of Argyle Bath King London Apr
